Header.title: 8x8 Chess Acedemy Pune
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

paragraph: Over a decade year of experience chess teacher,
Certified coach by World chess association(FIDE instructor).
Provides training to individuals, groups as well as various schools, colleges & universities from basic to advance level.
Why: Well structured syllabus for each level.
Online as well as offline coaching.
Decade years of experience in coaching for rating tournaments.
Why2: Personal guidance to achieve international rating.

Services.name: Online/Offline coaching
Services.text: daily muiltiple online batches over Skype and Zoom.

Services.name: Group coaching
Services.text: Online and offline group coaching, everyday multiple batches (limited students).

Services.name: Personal coaching
Services.text: Online and offline individual coaching (Special guidance to improve chess rating).

Services.name: Chess camps
Services.text: Regular chess camps for discussing latest trending topics.

Services.name: Conducting Tournaments
Services.text: On every weekend Real/Practice tournaments and special sessions on rating tournaments

Services.name: Coaching in Scools/Colleges
Services.text: We also provide chess coaching in various colleges and schools.

Testimonials.text: "Our daughter is taking online chess lessons from Londhe sir for about 9 months now. She loves her chess lessons and always very eager to start them. Lessons are very organized and engaging. Even though we live in the US, Londhe sir accommodates the time difference and ensures lessons are not missed. We really appreciate his teaching."
Testimonials.name: Manish and Pallavi Kulkarni (USA)
